answers.answer: You have to treat the PCOS... Typically, PCOS is treated with metformin and diet, though some doctors prefer to try it with diet only.You might want to take a look at the following thread... I've discussed diet that's typically recommended for PCOS, as well as type II diabetes and metabolic syndrome, which both often go hand in hand with PCOS.http://www.medhelp.org/posts/Weight-Loss--Dieting/Just-got-put-on-Metformin-for-PCOS--any-pointers/show/2516141

question: If pcos is causing my back to hurt, what's a good way to get rid of it???
title: back pain
